Context:
The College Employer Council (CEC) regularly publishes updates on sector-wide labour and employment news, as well as bargaining progress and agreements across various bargaining units. Here are some key facts from the text:

- The CEC has published several updates in 2023 and early 2024, which can be found online in their newsletter.
- In October 2023, Ontario’s public colleges reached an agreement with OPSEU part-time support staff, resulting in wage increases. More information can be found on the CEC website.
- Another agreement was reached between the CEC and OPSEU in August 2023, this time for full-time and partial-load academic employees, granting benefits and wage increases. The news release with more details is available on the CEC's website.
- Agreements were also reached in August 2023 between Ontario’s public colleges and OPSEU full-time support staff, which included wage and benefit increases. A news release with further information can be found on the CEC's website.
- The CEC provides bi-annual updates on bargaining and implementation of collective agreements across various bargaining units. Read the April 2023 and October 2023 Bargaining Bulletins for more information.

Entities mentioned:
- College Employer Council (CEC)
- OPSEU (Ontario Public Service Employees Union)
- Ontario's public colleges

Website contact details:
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Phone: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559

Additional information:
- The information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
